Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/72nd
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 71st and Ashland, due to, street blockage, near Ashland/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 71st and Ashland, due to, street blockage, near Ashland/72nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at California due to a sick customer. 

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
